name: prattler
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who talks for a long time about things that are silly or not important: Fiona's such a prattler - I wish she'd get to the point! See
prattle
More examplesFewer examplesHe's quite harmless, just a charming prattler. Her new profession is part talk-show prattler, part actor, part reporter, part old-fashioned pitchman.
